faq.title: FAQ
faq.subtitle: Everything you want to know about MuiStory

whatIs.question: What is MuiStory?
whatIs.answer: MuiStory is an AI-powered interactive story creation platform. You can describe your story ideas in natural language, and AI will generate complete interactive scripts. Players can experience different story paths by making different choices.

howCreate.question: How do I create my own story?
howCreate.answer: After registering, go to the dashboard and click 'Create Game'. You can use the AI Import feature to generate scripts from your outline, or use the visual editor to create manually.

pricing.question: Is it free to use?
pricing.answer: The platform is currently in early stages, and core features are free to use. We'll continue improving the product and may introduce premium features in the future.

variables.question: What is the variable system?
variables.answer: Variables can track player choices and states, such as affection levels or item counts. With variables, you can create true branching narratives where different players get different experiences.

minigames.question: What are mini games?
minigames.answer: Mini games are interactive segments embedded in story scenes, like puzzles or battles. AI can automatically generate mini game code based on your descriptions, making stories more engaging.

home.aboutContent: Welcome to MuiStory. One day I realized that AI can lower the barrier to creating interactive fiction/text adventure games, allowing more people to create and share their stories. Meanwhile, with proper development, letting authors control AI rather than be controlled by it can ensure story quality and gameplay. So, with the help of AI development tools, I created this platform.
home.aboutContent2: This platform is still in its early stages with limited features and content, but I will continue to improve it. If you have any suggestions or ideas, feel free to contact me!
home.noGames: No published games yet, please check back later!

about.pageDescription: Learn about MuiStory's core features, technical architecture, and vision
about.heroSubtitle: An AI-powered interactive story creation platform, empowering everyone to become storytellers
about.missionContent: We believe everyone has a story to tell. MuiStory uses AI technology to lower the barrier to creating interactive fiction and text adventure games, so creativity is no longer limited by technical skills. Our goal is to let authors control AI, rather than be controlled by it, ensuring story quality and gameplay.
about.featuresSubtitle: Powerful AI tools make storytelling simple and fun

aiAssist.title: AI-Assisted Creation
aiAssist.description: Zero coding required. Describe your ideas in natural language, and AI generates complete scripts. Import story outlines and generate branching narratives with one click.

aiChatbot.title: 24/7 AI Chatbot Assistant
aiChatbot.description: Always-available smart assistant to answer questions, optimize plots, and refine details. As simple as talking to a professional screenwriter.

variables.title: Variable System, Infinite Possibilities
variables.description: Use variables to change story paths based on player choices. Supports affection, items, attributes, and more.

minigames.title: Scene Mini Games
minigames.description: AI automatically generates interactive mini-games like puzzles and combat. Stories become not just readable, but playable.

richInteractive.title: Rich Multimedia
richInteractive.description: Support AI-generated images, voice, and other multimedia content for immersive reading experiences.

crossPlatform.title: Cross-Platform Publishing
crossPlatform.description: One-click publish to Web with responsive design for all devices. Easy sharing with friends.

about.aiSectionContent1: Our AI assistant can not only generate scripts but also understand your creative intent. Through natural language conversation, you can adjust story direction, optimize dialogue, and add interactive elements anytime.
about.aiSectionContent2: Supports multiple AI models including GPT-4 and Gemini to ensure creative quality. Built-in prompt templates help AI better understand interactive storytelling.
about.editorSectionContent1: Intuitive node-based editor lets you build stories like building blocks. Drag and connect to create branching narratives, what you see is what you get.
about.editorSectionContent2: Supports multi-scene management, character systems, variable editing, and other advanced features. Even complex multi-branch stories are easy to handle.

parser.title: DSL Parser
parser.description: Custom story scripting language supporting variables, conditions, loops, and more. TypeScript implementation, type-safe.

assetGenerator.title: Asset Generator
assetGenerator.description: Integrated with multiple AI image generation services, supporting batch generation and cache optimization. Auto compression and CDN distribution.

cloudflare.title: Edge Deployment
cloudflare.description: Built on Cloudflare Workers and D1 database, global edge deployment with millisecond response times.

about.platformSectionContent1: Responsive design ensures perfect experience on phones, tablets, and computers. PWA support lets you use it like a native app.
about.platformSectionContent2: Cloud-stored game progress, seamless cross-device continuation. Share links to let friends experience your creations.
about.ctaContent: Whether you want to experience amazing interactive stories or create your own adventures, MuiStory is here for you.

contact.pageDescription: Get in touch with the MuiStory team or contribute to the open source project
contact.heroSubtitle: We'd love to hear from you, whether it's feedback, suggestions, or collaboration
contact.openSourceSubtitle: MuiStory is fully open source and welcomes contributions
contact.repoDescription: AI-powered interactive fiction creation platform, built with Next.js, Cloudflare Workers, and various AI services.

issues.title: Submit an Issue
issues.description: Found a bug or have a feature request? Feel free to submit an issue on GitHub.

pullRequests.title: Submit a Pull Request
pullRequests.description: Want to contribute code directly? Fork the repo and submit a PR, we'll review it promptly.

contact.ctaContent: Whether you want to play or create, MuiStory welcomes you.
